text: Gilles Lapouge (November 7, 1923 â€“ July 31, 2020) was a French writer and journalist. He worked with the daily O Estado de S. Paulo. He won the 2007 Prix Femina Essai. He worked for many newspapers in Brazil and later worked for Le Monde when he moved back to France. Lapouge died on July 31, 2020 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French journalists
title: Gilles Lapouge
